item.description:
It's been two years since the devastating earthquake and tsunami hit Japan. People are moving onto new things, but the orphans still need our help. We want to send the message to Japan that they are not an old news and that they are not forgotten.



3/11 (mon) - 7pm to 8:30pm MEMORIAL SERVICE & COMMUNITY GATHERING

 

There will be a short documentary film screening, without sound but with English subtitles and the music dedication by Minghui Lin, cellist.

After the service, there will be a community gathering. Potluck-style

 

Ongoing project:

Quilt-making (You can write a message or create a design on a square piece. The finished quilt will be hand-delivered  to an elementary school or organization in the disaster-affected area.)


More info: http://tsunamiartauction.blogspot.com
Sign up: http://tsunami-hancock309.eventbrite.com

Please signup using above link.
item.name: 3.11 Tohoku Earthquake MEMORIAL SERVICE & COMMUNITY GATHERING
